Narrative (Outline particulars under which alien located/apprehended. Include details, not shown above, re time, place, manner of last entry, and elements which establish ad. ministrative and/or criminal violation. Indicate means and route of travel to interior) Alien has been advised of communication privileges pursuant to 8 CFR 242.2(e). Initial Date Money $10.00 Baggage None Subject freely admitted having entered the United States illegally at a place not designated as a Port of Entry, thus avoiding inspection by immigration officials. Subject states that she left San Salvador, El Salvador on 9-12-87 and traveled to Mexico D.F. by Commercial Airline arriving in Mexico D.F. on the same date. Subject further states that she traveled with her two grandsons FOIA (b)(6) and FOIA (b)(6) Subject then stated that they Left Mexico D.F. that same day by Commercial Airline and traveled to Tijuana B.C. Mexico. Subject states that they stayed in a Hotel for 3 days before crossing illegally into the United States. Subject further states that she was issued a Passport in San Salvador, El Salvador in July of 1987, however subject states that she lost it in Mexico. Subject states that she nor her grandsons made arrangments to be snuggled into the United States, and that they were on their way to Los Angeles, California to look for work. Subject states that she has a daughter (Aminta Guillen) living in Los Angeles, California. When subject was presented with Form I-274 she requested an Immigration Hearing. e709 0650 (If space insufficient, show "continued" and continue on reverse, from bottom up): (Signature and Title) DISTRIBUTION 6S 8 HV 91 dds 2861 Received (subject and documents) (report of interview) from WALOSE 9/16/27 Officer: Gregory M Garcia 9-16 19 37 at ( ).
